Lygurgus Cup
A technological marvel from the Roman Empire. The cup changes colors from Jade to Red based on lighting or fluids it holds.
Derrynaflan Chalice
A cup utilized during Christian religious ceremonies. Irish craftsmanship.
Principles of Etiquette
A simple book on etiquette that can be useful in diplomatic situations.
Tales of a Handmaiden
A book rumored to be based on the diary of a handmaiden to a Queen.
Roman Roads
A book that covers the Roman approach to road building, with some enlightening insight to the economical impacts.
Infantry Leads the Way
A military manual on different formations and training exercises to address common battlefield situations.
Mediterranean Mysteries
A book that tries to figure out mysteries using facts and logic.
Aladdin's Lamp
A genie's lamp is impressive enough, but Aladdin's fabled lamp is legendary.
Wolf Plate Mail
Women's plate mail, made of steel and silver, with sculpted wolf heads at the shoulders. Said to protect one from werewolves.
Diableries
A black bound book which carries a slight scent of charred flesh. Claims to hold the path to vampiric immortality.
Sleeping Dragon Plate
A ceramic plate depicting a young man laying down, while encircled by a sleeping dragon.
Ye Ole Dildo
A quality crafted implement for pleasure.
Norse Maiden Doll
A fine made doll, which has an unnatural warmth when held.
Helm of the Devourer
An intimidating helmet, with the face bearing a mandible shape, and the sides bearing curved horns.
Breeding Collar
This ancient gold studded collar is said to allow the wearer's body to be impregnated by beasts.
Venom Blade
A blade of unknown craftsmanship, with a red hued blade that seems to drip with toxins. It is highly poisonous to any that are cut by it.
Dragon Horn
This horn produces a bone rattling sound that strikes fear in the hearts of enemies, while bolstering your own troops.
Crimson Claw Banner
A banner with a cruel and violent history. It has been carried in some of the bloodiest battles in history, where the wielders are said to give no quarter.
Demon Bestiary
This vile scroll holds details on demons, theories related to summoning, and deals to be struck for increased power.
Evolution of Embalming
This scroll includes intricate details of the human body, which can be useful in either embalming, or medical pursuits.
Historic Trade Practices
This scroll contains details about the inner workings of a former merchant company that traded across Europe and North Africa.
Ancient Engineering
This scroll details the construction of a large monument. The construction methods used differ from today, while the details offer one to learn from the past.
